00053 class SerialPortDevice : public QObject, protected QScriptable
00054 {

00056         Q_CLASSINFO("ScriptAPIClassName", "SerialPort");//Can't use defines here!, moc doesn't handle defines

00075         enum BaudRateType_
00076         {
00077         #if defined(Q_OS_UNIX) || defined(qdoc)
00078                 BAUD50 = 50,                            
00079                 BAUD75 = 75,                            
00080                 BAUD134 = 134,              
00081                 BAUD150 = 150,              
00082                 BAUD200 = 200,              
00083                 BAUD1800 = 1800,            
00084         #  if defined(B76800) || defined(qdoc)
00085                 BAUD76800 = 76800,          
00086         #  endif
00087         #  if (defined(B230400) && defined(B4000000)) || defined(qdoc)
00088                 BAUD230400 = 230400,        
00089                 BAUD460800 = 460800,        
00090                 BAUD500000 = 500000,        
00091                 BAUD576000 = 576000,        
00092                 BAUD921600 = 921600,        
00093                 BAUD1000000 = 1000000,      
00094                 BAUD1152000 = 1152000,      
00095                 BAUD1500000 = 1500000,      
00096                 BAUD2000000 = 2000000,      
00097                 BAUD2500000 = 2500000,      
00098                 BAUD3000000 = 3000000,      
00099                 BAUD3500000 = 3500000,      
00100                 BAUD4000000 = 4000000,      
00101         #  endif
00102         #endif //Q_OS_UNIX
00103                 BAUD110 = 110,                          
00104                 BAUD300 = 300,                          
00105                 BAUD600 = 600,                          
00106                 BAUD1200 = 1200,                        
00107                 BAUD2400 = 2400,                        
00108                 BAUD4800 = 4800,                        
00109                 BAUD9600 = 9600,                        
00110 #if defined(Q_OS_WIN) || defined(qdoc)
00111                 BAUD14400 = 14400,          
00112 #endif  //Q_OS_WIN
00113                 BAUD19200 = 19200,                      
00114                 BAUD38400 = 38400,                      
00115 #if defined(Q_OS_WIN) || defined(qdoc)
00116                 BAUD56000 = 56000,          
00117 #endif  //Q_OS_WIN
00118                 BAUD57600 = 57600,                      
00119 #if defined(Q_OS_WIN) || defined(qdoc)
00120                 BAUD115200 = 115200,            
00121                 BAUD128000 = 128000,        
00122                 BAUD256000 = 256000         
00123 #else
00124                 BAUD115200 = 115200                     
00125 #endif  //Q_OS_WIN
00126         };

00130         {
00131                 DATA_5 = 5,                                     
00132                 DATA_6 = 6,                                     
00133                 DATA_7 = 7,                                     
00134                 DATA_8 = 8                                      
00135         };
00136         
00138         enum ParityType_
00139         {
00140                 PAR_NONE,                                       
00141                 PAR_ODD,                                        
00142                 PAR_EVEN,                                       
00143         #if defined(Q_OS_WIN) || defined(qdoc)
00144                 PAR_MARK,                                       
00145         #endif
00146                 PAR_SPACE                                       
00147         };
00148         
00150         enum StopBitsType_
00151         {
00152                 STOP_1,                                         
00153         #if defined(Q_OS_WIN) || defined(qdoc)
00154                 STOP_1_5,                                       
00155         #endif
00156                 STOP_2                                          
00157         };
00158         
00160         enum FlowType_
00161         {
00162                 FLOW_OFF,                                       
00163                 FLOW_HARDWARE,                          
00164                 FLOW_XONXOFF                            
00165         };
00166 
00168         enum QueryMode_
00169         {
00170                 Polling,                                        
00171                 EventDriven                                     
00172         };
00173 
00175         enum OpenMode_
00176         {
00177                 NotOpen =       (int)QIODevice::NotOpen,                
00178                 ReadOnly =      (int)QIODevice::ReadOnly,               
00179                 WriteOnly =     (int)QIODevice::WriteOnly,              
00180                 ReadWrite =     (int)QIODevice::ReadWrite,              
00181                 Append =        (int)QIODevice::Append,                 
00182                 Truncate =      (int)QIODevice::Truncate,               
00183                 Text =          (int)QIODevice::Text,                   
00184                 Unbuffered =(int)QIODevice::Unbuffered          
00185         };
